title: Ticket #7142: garbage at the end of Exception code: line in Windows core files
description:
On windows, when a daemon prints out a "CORE" file, there is a field on the Exception code: line that will sometimes print a garbage string. This seems to happen mostly when the exception is a c-runtime debug check.

The reason is that the buffer used to hold the string is never set to "", and there are some code paths that never write into it, leaving the string to contain stack garbage
